attributes.action: Any mp crossing the floor should trigger a bye election in thier constituency
attributes.additional_details: It is wrong that an mp who ran for election for a party then chage that party because he wants to its unfair to the electors of his constituency
attributes.background: To change the law and make it compulsory to have a bye election  in the constituency of any mp changing his party

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "By-elections to be called automatically when MPs defect to another party" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737660
